I have a few teams - but I am thinking of making another run at the set (a beater set).

If you have any - can be trimmed / cut / creased / ugly..... as long as all of the players are shown - please email scan and pricing to:
[url]joe@internetville.com[/url]

Thanks and Merry Christmas.

Just got the one.

Merry Christmas to you, too, buddy.
